meanings.sent1: She misguidedly followed the wrong directions.
meanings.sent2: He misguidedly believed the false information.
meanings.sent3: The cat misguidedly tried to catch its own tail.
meanings.sent4: The student misguidedly thought the answer was on the back of the paper.
meanings.sent5: The hiker misguidedly ventured off the trail and got lost.

meanings.sent1: They misguidedly assumed the store was closed.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic misguidedly fixed the wrong part of the car.
meanings.sent3: The robot misguidedly poured milk instead of oil into the engine.
meanings.sent4: The magician misguidedly revealed the secret to the audience.
meanings.sent5: The chef misguidedly added salt instead of sugar to the cake batter.
